creator: thierry.bissler@laposte.net
text:
I have an <image> element that tries to display a 2400x3600 JPEG in a 2400x3600 
box (scale 1). It results in a java.lang.OutOfMemoryError runtime exception.

The only method I call is "loadSVGDocument".

If I change the JPEG file so that its size is 240x360 (but still displayed in a 
2400x3600 box (scale 10)), it works fine.

The problem is... you are running out of memory.  The image is
~34MB.  You probably want to use the -Xmx128mb option to get a
more reasonable partition, when you run Batik rather than getting
the default 32 or 64MB partition.
